title: Dokuhime no Hitsugi
description:
"Poison princesses" are beautiful girls who have taken poison into their bodies with each meal since they were babies and ended up poisoning all of their body fluids. 

A dramatic story that depicts the rebirth of Grandle, who fell into the trap of an enemy country and was attacked by a former ally, the only survivor of the cursed triplet prince, and the conflicts of those who were left behind.
